name: EVEScape Shuttle (Marian Dumitriu)
description:
EVEScape Shuttle is an escape room game that integrates the Eve franchise as part of our university assignment.

You play as a shuttle pilot transporting goods between planets when suddenly you're hit by raiders and have 15 minutes to escape before they arrive.

The Game has a total of 5 puzzles. You must first exit the pilot bay by getting the 4-digit keypad combination right (randomises each play-through), make your way towards the generator and restore power by placing the power cells in the correct generator slots. Then turn life support systems on, this causes an explosion which further decreases the time, quickly pick up the gas mask as your oxygen and time runs out. Complete the out of state puzzle and escape the ship via escape pod.

A keyboard is required to play. The controls are simple: Mouse to look, left-click to press keypad keys, W/A/S/D or Arrows to move, E to interact, hold Q then press E for Neural Boost.

Credits:

This game was made by: Marian Dumitriu, Steven Taylor, Nilanth Sivarajah and George Nicholson.
